options.description: ID of the mode of payment for the deal. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: ID of the deal pipeline that it belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: deal_product_id
options.description: ID of the product that the deal belongs to (in a multi-product company). Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: deal_reason_id
options.description: ID of the reason for losing the deal. Can only be set if the deal is in 'Lost' stage. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: ID of the deal stage that the deal belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: ID of the user to whom the deal is assigned. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.description: Probability of winning the deal as a number between 0 and 100

options.description: ID of the account that the deal belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: territory_id
options.description: ID of the territory that the deal belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

subProperties.description: ID of the user who owns the sales activity. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

subProperties.displayName: Sales Activity Outcome Name or ID
subProperties.name: sales_activity_outcome_id
subProperties.description: ID of a sales activity's outcome. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

subProperties.displayName: Sales Activity Type Name or ID
subProperties.name: sales_activity_type_id
subProperties.description: ID of a sales activity type for which the sales activity is updated. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

subProperties.name: from_date
subProperties.description: Timestamp that denotes the start of the sales activity

subProperties.name: targetable_id
subProperties.description: ID of the entity for which the sales activity is updated. The type of entity is selected in "Target Type".

subProperties.name: targetable_type
subProperties.description: Type of the entity for which the sales activity is updated

subProperties.name: title
subProperties.description: Title of the sales activity to update

values.name: userId
values.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

sales_activity_type_id.displayName: Sales Activity Type Name or ID
sales_activity_type_id.name: sales_activity_type_id

possibleValues.name: Custom Field
possibleValues.description: Only allowed custom fields of type "Text field", "Number", "Dropdown" or "Radio button"

subProperties.name: entities
subProperties.description: Use 'entities' to query against related entities. You can include multiple entities at once, provided the field is available in both entities or else you'd receive an error response.

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
